venue.address_2: 5th floor - go straight out of elevators
venue.name: Watermill Building

item.description:
Hi all, I've just taken over Women in Business Network so let's get together and celebrate! I'd like to kick-off with an evening of open networking to reacquaint ourselves, round-the-room introductions/elevator pitches and a sharing of ideas for future events.

I'll provide some nibbles and beverages, you provide the conversation and networking.

Hope to see you all then!
item.name: Let's Regroup, Women in Business!
